description: This is the English version of the site
sponsors: made possible with the help of

schedule.title: schedule
schedule.rego: rider registration begins at 08:00 on Saturday on the track
schedule.saturdayStart: rides on saturday begin at 09:00 or after end of registration
schedule.lunch: lunch break is planned for 12:00, you can order food from the organizer
schedule.competition: slide competition will be held on saturday afternoon

camp.title: camp
camp.desc1: a camp site will be provided for all attendees right next to the track
camp.showers: showers will be provided on Saturday in the nearby sports stadium TJ Beskyd Svrčinovec

parking.title: parking
parking.desc1: parking will be provided for all attendees right next to the track

food.title: food
food.desc1: we offer an option to order food from a local restaurant via the organizer
food.desc2: orders are going to be accepted until 10:00 on both days
food.desc5: please bring exact ammounts or pay via Revolut

documents.title: Documents
documents.desc1: Every rider will need a signed safety waiver and a GDPR consent form.
documents.desc2: Riders under 18 years will need these documents signed by their legal guardian.
documents.desc3: If you bring filled-in documents, your signing process will be faster.
documents.desc4: You can download the documents here
documents.desc5: GDPR and general guidelines for reference (you don't need to bring this)
